storyInfo: During a banquet, the Saintess and Enciodes exchange sharp words, but still come to find crucial common ground. Afterwards, the regret-filled Viscount confides his true feelings to Degenbrecher. Three old friends chat away in the lobby of Karlan Trade headquarters.

attributes.content: I'm back.
attributes.name: Slippery Soldier

attributes.content: Lisburn, what are you standing around for?
attributes.name: Slippery Soldier

attributes.content: Nothing.
attributes.name: Seasoned Soldier

attributes.content: Oh yeah, I remember now. Old Turiels' daughter was cooking in the back kitchen, so you wanted some excuse to slip on over.
attributes.name: Slippery Soldier

attributes.content: Look at you, acting like you're doing us a great service.
attributes.name: Slippery Soldier

attributes.content: She used to work as a chef in a nearby restaurant, so it makes plenty of sense to bring her onboard.
attributes.name: Seasoned Soldier

attributes.content: Whatever. More importantly, why's the food not ready yet?
attributes.name: Slippery Soldier

attributes.content: Hey boss, how come the food hasn't been served yet?
attributes.name: Slippery Soldier

attributes.content: Sorry about that.
attributes.name: Server

attributes.content: The main reason is that we're a bit overloaded right now. Even though we've upped the kitchen staff, it's still not enough to handle the workload.
attributes.name: Server

attributes.content: In that case, l don't mind lending a hand!
attributes.name: Seasoned Soldier

attributes.content: There's no need.
attributes.name: Kjarr

attributes.content: Who are you...?
attributes.name: Slippery Soldier

attributes.content: I am chief maid to the Saintess, Kjarr. It's a pleasure to make your acquaintance.
attributes.name: Kjarr

attributes.content: Hah, we're just a bunch of lowly soldiers. No need for the formalities.
attributes.name: Slippery Soldier

attributes.content: Lia.
attributes.name: Kjarr

attributes.content: Yes, Madam?
attributes.name: Servant

attributes.content: Split the accompanying servants into teams and have them take turns helping in the kitchen.
attributes.name: Kjarr

attributes.content: Make sure the banquet proceeds smoothly.
attributes.name: Kjarr

attributes.content: Understood.
attributes.name: Servant

attributes.content: But... we couldn't possibly have you–
attributes.name: Seasoned Soldier

attributes.content: There's no need to worry, sir.
attributes.name: Kjarr

attributes.content: Though this banquet is hosted by the Lord Viscount, this land is still Kjerag, and you are all esteemed guests in the eyes of the Saintess.
attributes.name: Kjarr

attributes.content: As the Lord Viscount was gracious enough to extend an invitation to the Saintess, it is only natural that we servants lend our assistance as well.
attributes.name: Kjarr

attributes.content: Additionally... Pardon me if this may sound offensive, but it would be out of place for those whose hands wield weapons to carry plates.
attributes.name: Kjarr

attributes.content: Ngh...
attributes.name: Seasoned Soldier

attributes.content: Calm down, Lisburn. The maid's right. We'd probably end up breaking a whole bunch of crockery if we tried to help.
attributes.name: Slippery Soldier

attributes.content: ...I know.
attributes.name: Seasoned Soldier

attributes.content: But, if there's any physical labor that needs doing, you just give us a holler, alright?
attributes.name: Seasoned Soldier

attributes.content: Oh, come to think of it, the kitchen could use some extra hands to help them carry some groceries. I'm not sure if...
attributes.name: Kjarr

attributes.content: I'm on my way!
attributes.name: Seasoned Soldier

attributes.content: Thanks, Madam.
attributes.name: Slippery Soldier

attributes.content: My pleasure.
attributes.name: Kjarr

attributes.content: Now that things are settled here, I won't further disturb your enjoyment of the banquet.
attributes.name: Kjarr

attributes.content: ...I'm back.
attributes.name: Servant

attributes.content: Lia, I have one more favor to ask of you. Can you see if the kitchen has these items? If they do, I'd like them to make one additional dish.
attributes.name: Kjarr

attributes.content: I'd like... a fruit and cheese wrap.
attributes.name: Kjarr

attributes.content: Pulling out the old home cooking?
attributes.name: Servant

attributes.content: But the Saintess normally doesn't touch that stuff.
attributes.name: Servant

attributes.content: Now, now. Just listen to me.
attributes.name: Kjarr

attributes.content: Karlan Trade's employees seem to be arriving one after another.
attributes.name: Kjarr

attributes.content: That's right. The viscount invited not only the Saintess and Master Enciodes, but also the elders of the Vine-Bear Court as well as the employees of Karlan Trade.
attributes.name: Servant

attributes.content: As extravagant as one would expect of a Victorian viscount.
attributes.name: Servant

attributes.content: The man's not all show either. He even invited Turiels, head chef of the Burdenpeak Hotel.
attributes.name: Servant

attributes.content: His foul temper isn't something that can be bought with money.
attributes.name: Servant

attributes.content: It goes to show how well they've gotten on with our people during the month they've been in Kjerag.
attributes.name: Kjarr

attributes.content: Hmm?
attributes.name: Kjarr

attributes.content: Chug! Chug!
attributes.name: Sickly Soldier

attributes.content: *hic*... Chug, chug!
attributes.name: Karlan Trade Employee

attributes.content: *braaaaap*...
attributes.name: Karlan Trade Employee

attributes.content: Not bad, not bad! You mountain folk sure know how to hold your booze!
attributes.name: Sickly Soldier

attributes.content: But you still can't out-drink me! Heh... hehe.
attributes.name: Sickly Soldier

attributes.content: Who's up next?
attributes.name: Sickly Soldier

attributes.content: Urgh. Those men can get sloshed, even in a place like this?
attributes.name: Servant

attributes.content: Not to mention, quite a few have already ended up under the table.
attributes.name: Servant

attributes.content: Kjarr, what should we do?
attributes.name: Servant

attributes.content: Well...
attributes.name: Kjarr

attributes.content: Getting on well is certainly a wonderful thing, but getting on too well can be problematic.
attributes.name: Kjarr

attributes.content: This sort of thing, however, ends up being a headache for certain other people.
attributes.name: Kjarr

attributes.content: Gnosis, the Tschäggättä are in position.
attributes.name: Valais

attributes.content: I have them patrolling the front and rear entrances to prevent anyone from sneaking inside the venue.
attributes.name: Valais

attributes.content: No need to be nervous.
attributes.name: Gnosis

attributes.content: Valais, send one team to go help in the kitchen.
attributes.name: Gnosis

attributes.content: Understood.
attributes.name: Valais

attributes.content: Care for a drink? If you dare, that is.
attributes.name: Gnosis

attributes.content: Th-This is some crazy strong stuff. We seriously doing this?
attributes.name: Sickly Soldier

attributes.content: As I said, up to you.
attributes.name: Gnosis

attributes.content: Haha, you got me. You've got guts, I'll give you that. Cheers!
attributes.name: Sickly Soldier

attributes.content: Pour me another glass.
attributes.name: Gnosis

attributes.content: On it!
attributes.name: Sickly Soldier

attributes.content: You're... not bad...
attributes.name: Sickly Soldier

attributes.content: Do we have a hangover remedy?
attributes.name: Gnosis

attributes.content: Lia.
attributes.name: Kjarr

attributes.content: Right here.
attributes.name: Servant

attributes.content: Good.
attributes.name: Gnosis

attributes.content: Huh? D-Director?!
attributes.name: Karlan Trade Employee

attributes.content: Enjoy your nap?
attributes.name: Gnosis

attributes.content: Uh, y-yes!
attributes.name: Karlan Trade Employee

attributes.content: That one soldier with a stomach of iron... You managed to drink him under the table?!
attributes.name: Karlan Trade Employee

attributes.content: Yep.
attributes.name: Gnosis

attributes.content: That's crazy...
attributes.name: Karlan Trade Employee

attributes.content: Lay off the alcohol for the rest of the day. Go rest.
attributes.name: Gnosis

attributes.content: Th-Thank you very much.
attributes.name: Karlan Trade Employee

attributes.content: Color me surprised. I didn't expect Karlan Trade's CTO to be such a good drinker.
attributes.name: Kjarr

attributes.content: I can hardly tell from your face that you just downed two bottles of strong liquor.
attributes.name: Kjarr

attributes.content: Just some useless tricks I picked up when I was younger.
attributes.name: Gnosis

attributes.content: Did you frequently attend such occasions in your youth?
attributes.name: Kjarr

attributes.content: Don't worry about it.
attributes.name: Gnosis

attributes.content: The banquet will start soon, and I'll have Karlan Trade's employees help move things along.
attributes.name: Gnosis

attributes.content: You're not going to join in the conversation, Master Gnosis?
attributes.name: Kjarr

attributes.content: Not at the moment.
attributes.name: Gnosis

attributes.content: It's their time now.
attributes.name: Gnosis

attributes.content: Umm, you two––
attributes.name: Harold

attributes.content: Why are you so taciturn today, Sir Enciodes? Is there something on your mind, or has coming to the banquet soured your mood?
attributes.name: Enya

attributes.content: Your usual quips and retorts are nowhere to be heard today.
attributes.name: Enya

attributes.content: I appreciate the Saintess's concern.
attributes.name: Enciodes

attributes.content: But, it's simply that sitting at the same table as the Saintess is a terrifying affair, and I can only hold my tongue in her presence.
attributes.name: Enciodes

attributes.content: I see. I did not think Sir Enciodes the pious type, but I stand corrected.
attributes.name: Enya

attributes.content: I dare not speak out of line.
attributes.name: Enciodes

attributes.content: Oh? There are things in this world that even Sir Enciodes dares not do?
attributes.name: Enya

attributes.content: Um... Haha, look how nice the weather is today. Perfect day to be holding a banquet, wouldn't you say?
attributes.name: Harold

attributes.content: Why don't you two go–
attributes.name: Harold

attributes.content: Given the Saintess's high praise, there are naturally many things I am afraid of.
attributes.name: Enciodes

attributes.content: I won't prattle on with the details, but take the ceremony for Kjeragandr's statue the day after tomorrow. For such an important occasion, all of Karlan Trade must come together as one, without a single misstep.
attributes.name: Enciodes

attributes.content: That being the case, I would recommend you be thorough and circumspect as well, Sir Enciodes.
attributes.name: Enya

attributes.content: The completion of Kjeragandr's statue is of utmost importance to Kjerag. Not to mention, we are in the presence of our Victorian guests who are eager to 'congratulate' us. There is no such thing as too much caution.
attributes.name: Enya

attributes.content: It is as you say.
attributes.name: Enciodes

attributes.content: The Saintess is well-versed in all things divine, and the multitude of preparations made for the ceremony are impeccable and well thought-out. In all respects, a true blessing upon Kjerag.
attributes.name: Enciodes

attributes.content: As for all other affairs, please rest assured that Karlan Trade will take care of the Vine-Bear Court's concerns.
attributes.name: Enciodes

attributes.content: Now, then. It's certainly reassuring to see the two of you so young and promising!
attributes.name: Harold

attributes.content: As a reminder, we're not only here to celebrate, but also to discuss a collaboration––
attributes.name: Harold

attributes.content: Seeing as how you're eloquent as ever, you seem to have no shortage of confidence.
attributes.name: Enya

attributes.content: You've been quite busy making a name for yourself, Sir Enciodes. Though I rarely go down the mountain, news of Karlan Trade's exploits are regularly reaching my ears.
attributes.name: Enya

attributes.content: But, please do not forget this, Sir Enciodes. For thousands of years, Kjerag has relied on hard work and pragmatism from generation to generation to develop our homeland into what it is today, not utilitarianism and reckless adventurism.
attributes.name: Enya

attributes.content: The Silverashes will never forget Kjeragandr's admonition of Her people.
attributes.name: Enciodes

attributes.content: However, the Saintess must also understand that along with the people of Kjerag's hard work and pragmatism is an indomitable adventuring spirit, and a desire to ascend the highest summits.
attributes.name: Enciodes

attributes.content: Perhaps a little bit of this spirit is also what we need when it comes to dealing with external developments.
attributes.name: Enciodes

attributes.content: I only hope that your enthusiasm does not lead you headfirst into danger.
attributes.name: Enya

attributes.content: Haha, the young truly are so full of energy. But, the Saintess is correct. Sometimes, stability is, in fact, necessary.
attributes.name: Harold

attributes.content: I invited the two of you here because I wanted to––
attributes.name: Harold

attributes.content: I am truly touched by the Saintess's concern.
attributes.name: Enciodes

attributes.content: Please rest assured that I will handle this matter, and not betray your expectations.
attributes.name: Enciodes

attributes.content: All things in Kjerag must inevitably answer to Kjeragandr's will.
attributes.name: Enciodes

attributes.content: Without sufficient faith, is it not true that I would struggle to take even a single step?
attributes.name: Enciodes

attributes.content: ...You're just as awful as you ever were!
attributes.name: Enya

attributes.content: Ditto.
attributes.name: Enciodes

attributes.content: Gah, you two! If you have a disagreement, talk it through like adults! Don't go and ruin the peace!
attributes.name: Harold

attributes.content: Let's move on and discuss our cooperation––
attributes.name: Harold

attributes.content: Sir Enciodes, your brain is as hard and stubborn as the purest Originium ice crystal.
attributes.name: Enya

attributes.content: The Saintess remains unmoving and... speaks bluntly for the first time in a long while.
attributes.name: Enciodes

attributes.content: I can't hold a candle to you in that regard.
attributes.name: Enya

attributes.content: But it seems that even after all these years, our great Sir Enciodes still has not learned to retain his capital.
attributes.name: Enya

attributes.content: To what does the Great Saintess refer?
attributes.name: Enciodes

attributes.content: Have your old habits not flared up again? Taking on every bit of risk with no regard for the consequences?
attributes.name: Enya

attributes.content: The greater the risk, the greater the reward.
attributes.name: Enciodes

attributes.content: I hope you won't regret your choices later on down the road.
attributes.name: Enya

attributes.content: Nobody's going to sneak money under your pillow today!
attributes.name: Enya

attributes.content: Indeed, that won't be happening again.
attributes.name: Enciodes

attributes.content: No longer will I be woken by the jingling of coins, or have to buy candies and snacks on margin and pay back thrice the amount.
attributes.name: Enciodes

attributes.content: I never asked you to pay me back!
attributes.name: Enya

attributes.content: Please, you two––
attributes.name: Harold

attributes.content: Just one moment please, Your Lordship.
attributes.name: Enciodes & Enya

attributes.content: *sigh*... Fine, I suppose I'll drink to myself for now...
attributes.name: Harold

attributes.content: Holy Saintess, Sir Enciodes, I have no intention of involving myself in your private affairs.
attributes.name: Harold

attributes.content: But, if the Saintess has her own thoughts about Kjerag's present situation...
attributes.name: Harold

attributes.content: Then, reciprocating the Duke's offer may be the perfect option for you.
attributes.name: Harold

attributes.content: What do you mean?
attributes.name: Enya

attributes.content: Holy Saintess, might I tell you what I've found most impressive about Kjerag?
attributes.name: Harold

attributes.content: Please do.
attributes.name: Enya

attributes.content: I recall the time I paid a medical call to a herdsman, Leones was his name. A young beast in his herd had gotten lost while grazing.
attributes.name: Harold

attributes.content: I offered to help him search for it, but he declined and told me not to worry.
attributes.name: Harold

attributes.content: He had me wait until sundown, and left to have supper.
attributes.name: Harold

attributes.content: And so I waited.
attributes.name: Harold

attributes.content: After finishing the treatment, I set up a cooking pot over the grass with him. We lit the pot, and he found a good piece of cheese. You should've heard the sizzling sound it made when he threw it in.
attributes.name: Harold

attributes.content: I was sitting to the side on a short bench, still thinking about the young beast, when I heard a high-pitched cry in the distance.
attributes.name: Harold

attributes.content: This might be something you see all the time in Kjerag.
attributes.name: Harold

attributes.content: But for me, when I saw that young beast returning to the pasture at sunset; the way it found its way back to its mothers side, the two nuzzling against each other––
attributes.name: Harold

attributes.content: What I felt at that moment... was something I don't know how to describe.
attributes.name: Harold

attributes.content: Old Leones told me that burdenbeasts recognize the scent of their kin, especially foals, which are particularly sensitive to their mother's scent.
attributes.name: Harold

attributes.content: Even if they get lost, they'll always find their way back by following their mother's scent.
attributes.name: Harold

attributes.content: That blood bond reminds me of the way the people of Kjerag view their land.
attributes.name: Harold

attributes.content: It reminds me... of the way Sir Enciodes gave up Victoria in all her glory to return to Kjerag.
attributes.name: Harold

attributes.content: I see Your Lordship speaks very highly of Sir Enciodes. It is true that he has made many achievements thus far––
attributes.name: Enya

attributes.content: But if you are comparing him to a young burdenbeast returning to his homeland thanks to his ties with his 'mother' by the name of Kjerag, I find that joke quite droll.
attributes.name: Enya

attributes.content: It is indeed thanks to Sir Enciodes's longing for his homeland that House Caster decided to fund Karlan Trade.
attributes.name: Harold

attributes.content: Moreover, the Duke believed that since Sir Enciodes greatly treasured the Kjerag blood flowing in his veins, he likewise would not come to despise the other half of his blood–
attributes.name: Harold

attributes.content: The Caster bloodline.
attributes.name: Harold

attributes.content: Holy Saintess, as I have previously stated, I am not here to stoke conflict.
attributes.name: Harold

attributes.content: But, at the inception of Karlan Trade, it was Caster who extended a helping hand to Sir Enciodes.
attributes.name: Harold

attributes.content: And now that Sir Enciodes has proven his worth, the Duke believes that it is time to collect a bit of interest.
attributes.name: Harold

attributes.content: It appears that a few pieces of candy will no longer be sufficient, Sir Enciodes.
attributes.name: Enya

attributes.content: It's not so complicated, really. What the Duke wants is simply a show of sincerity.
attributes.name: Harold

attributes.content: Her Grace wishes to see this goodwill from Sir Enciodes, from Karlan Trade, and ultimately, from Kjerag itself.
attributes.name: Harold

attributes.content: A show of sincerity towards the Duke of Caster, and towards Victoria.
attributes.name: Harold

attributes.content: So long as this sincerity exists, then our future cooperation will only become more intimate.
attributes.name: Harold

attributes.content: And if we fail to express such sincerity?
attributes.name: Enya

attributes.content: Harold puts down his tableware, then walks over to the window and opens it.
The cold wind laced with snow and ice instantly pours into the room. Even the burning stove is helpless to resist the chill.
He quickly closes the window once more.
Haha, my apologies.
attributes.name: Harold

attributes.content: The Saintess's question was so incisive, I found myself wanting a breath of fresh air.
attributes.name: Harold

attributes.content: After staying in this warm room for so long, I had forgotten how cold it was outside, you see.
attributes.name: Harold

attributes.content: That being the case, Your Lordship could have simply entertained Sir Enciodes at this banquet. Why is my presence necessary?
attributes.name: Enya

attributes.content: Well, you see, I've been eating and drinking remarkably well here. During my morning constitutional, my blood pressure had gone down even as my blood sugar was up a tad.
attributes.name: Harold

attributes.content: I wouldn't mind staying here for another year or so.
attributes.name: Harold

attributes.content: But you see, I find the Duke's incessant nagging quite bothersome.
attributes.name: Harold

attributes.content: Nowadays, Karlan Trade has become a pillar of Kjerag, and the kinship between the Great Saintess and Sir Enciodes runs deep.
attributes.name: Harold

attributes.content: I simply wanted to provide an opportunity for the two of you to sit down and talk things over.
attributes.name: Harold

attributes.content: I would like you to help me convince Sir Enciodes.
attributes.name: Harold

attributes.content: I appreciate Your Lordship's candor.
attributes.name: Enya

attributes.content: However, everything that has a beginning must also have an end.
attributes.name: Enya

attributes.content: It is true that Kjerag owes much of its current standing to Karlan Trade; but if I, as the Saintess, were to say that I know nothing of this, it would simply be avoiding responsibility.
attributes.name: Enya

attributes.content: If you accept that I am the leader of this nation, then it must follow that I am also responsible for its current condition.
attributes.name: Enya

attributes.content: I cannot come up here and confidently proclaim that the ways of the past were wrong.
attributes.name: Enya

attributes.content: Sir Enciodes always boasts about how he was the one who chose Kjerag's current path.
attributes.name: Enya

attributes.content: However, to this day, everything in Kjerag is the result of decisions that we have collectively made as a people, of which I am but one member.
attributes.name: Enya

attributes.content: Sir Enciodes himself has no right to rebuke Kjerag, as she is today.
attributes.name: Enya

attributes.content: And the same is true for me.
attributes.name: Enya

attributes.content: ...I see now.
attributes.name: Harold

attributes.content: It seems I really ought to try more of Kjerag's food while I still have the appetite.
attributes.name: Harold

attributes.content: Please come with me, both of you.
attributes.name: Harold

attributes.content: Once again, I must thank you for your hospitality today, My Lord.
attributes.name: Enciodes
Harold
attributes.content: I hope my choice of dishes will suit both your tastes. They are traditional Kjerag dishes that I specially requested Chef Turiels prepare.

attributes.name: Harold
attributes.content: Wow, this cheese wrap looks positively splendid!
Cheese wraps? And, there are even fruit chunks inside...
attributes.name: Enya

attributes.content: ...Truly, a traditional household dish.
attributes.name: Enciodes

attributes.content: Dig in, my friends. Don't be shy.
attributes.name: Harold

attributes.content: After you, Sir Enciodes.
attributes.name: Enya

attributes.content: Very well... if you insist.
attributes.name: Enciodes

attributes.content: ...That smell again.
attributes.name: Enciodes

attributes.content: You still remember it?
attributes.name: Enya

attributes.content: Of course.
attributes.name: Enciodes

attributes.content: Gnosis should be here. Where is he?
attributes.name: Enciodes

attributes.content: Sir, there were these Victorian soldiers earlier...
attributes.name: Karlan Trade Employee

attributes.content: Soldiers?
attributes.name: Enciodes

attributes.content: It all makes sense now.
attributes.name: Enciodes

attributes.content: It would be unbefitting of the Saintess to personally appear before Victorian soldiers, no?
attributes.name: Enciodes

attributes.content: Do as you will. Don't worry about me.
attributes.name: Enya

attributes.content: Now then, I shall not take up any more of your time, Holy Saintess.
attributes.name: Harold

attributes.content: It really is that same smell.
attributes.name: Enya

attributes.content: *sigh*—
attributes.name: Harold

attributes.content: At least the bit of silver lining is the Trilby Ashers can't accuse me of doing nothing.
attributes.name: Harold

attributes.content: I've done what needed doing, and the ceremony is about to begin. I suppose it's time to head back.
attributes.name: Harold

attributes.content: Oh right, can't forget to pick up souvenirs for the wife and daughter.
attributes.name: Harold

attributes.content: And also––
attributes.name: Harold

attributes.content: Alas, it would be remiss of me to leave any regrets behind on this trip.
attributes.name: Harold

attributes.content: Hmph.
attributes.name: Degenbrecher

attributes.content: Ah, there you are, Madam Degenbrecher.
attributes.name: Harold
Harold
attributes.content: I see you've found yourself a lovely spot! Clean and––

attributes.name: Harold
attributes.content: Hey now, don't go!
If you want an audience, go talk to Enciodes. Or Gnosis.
attributes.name: Degenbrecher

attributes.content: I'll have nothing to do with your little games.
attributes.name: Degenbrecher

attributes.content: Come now. That's no way to be talking.
attributes.name: Harold

attributes.content: With all this delicious food and drink in front of you, would it really kill you to exchange a few pleasantries?
attributes.name: Harold

attributes.content: For example, shall we toast?
attributes.name: Harold

attributes.content: Nein danke.
attributes.name: Degenbrecher

attributes.content: Oh? Are you a woman who can't handle her drink?
attributes.name: Harold

attributes.content: I'm much better at handling men who try to ply me with drink.
attributes.name: Degenbrecher

attributes.content: Shall I prove it to you?
attributes.name: Degenbrecher

attributes.content: Hahaha! No need, I'll take your word for it.
attributes.name: Harold

attributes.content: Oh, right. Lily's in fine shape now, thanks to your timely handling of the matter.
attributes.name: Harold

attributes.content: I've already arranged for follow-up care, and her little ones are in good health as well.
attributes.name: Harold

attributes.content: Leones said to leave one for you to name.
attributes.name: Harold

attributes.content: ...I'm glad things worked out.
attributes.name: Degenbrecher

attributes.content: And I'll pass on that last part. Don't have much of a naming sense.
attributes.name: Degenbrecher

attributes.content: Aha! In that case, why not let me do it for you?
attributes.name: Harold

attributes.content: Never fear. Naming is a bit of a science in Victoria, and I happen to have a bit of expertise in the field!
attributes.name: Harold

attributes.content: The little one is a girl, so my suggestion would be to name her Olivia Turnbottom Michelle Craigavon!
attributes.name: Harold

attributes.content: I put together my last name, my wife's maiden name, and my grandmother's first name, making her the same as my daughter's––
attributes.name: Harold

attributes.content: I've changed my mind. Her name's Dolor.
attributes.name: Degenbrecher

attributes.content: *cough* *cough* *cough*––!
attributes.name: Harold

attributes.content: B-But I wasn't finished yet, Madam Degenbrecher––
attributes.name: Harold

attributes.content: Her name is Dolor.
attributes.name: Degenbrecher

attributes.content: But, Olivia...
attributes.name: Harold

attributes.content: Dolor.
attributes.name: Degenbrecher

attributes.content: ..Alright, alright!
attributes.name: Harold

attributes.content: Dolor, umm, is also a fine name for a girl. 'Healthy and strong', right?
attributes.name: Harold

attributes.content: Even though I still think Olivia Turnbottom Michelle Craigavon has a bit more charm to it...
attributes.name: Harold

attributes.content: Nevertheless, I think Leones will be quite fond of the name, fitting as it is for a Kjerag girl.
attributes.name: Harold

attributes.content: Madam Degenbrecher, I also have another favor to ask of you, presumptuous as it may be. Please take a look at this... I'm afraid I'll be leaving empty handed on this business trip.
attributes.name: Harold

attributes.content: I would at least like to leave a little memento for myself, as a personal note.
attributes.name: Harold

attributes.content: As I said back at the station, I'm a huge fan of yours, see? Would you be willing to give me your autograph?
attributes.name: Harold

attributes.content: You don't seem like the type to obsess over knightsports.
attributes.name: Degenbrecher

attributes.content: You think too highly of me. Vulgar man that I am, far be it from me to avoid vulgar pleasures.
attributes.name: Harold

attributes.content: Though the arena is certainly different from the battlefield, the victors all have something that elevates them above the crowd.
attributes.name: Harold

attributes.content: It certainly is a fine pastime–– and I hope you take no offense to me saying that, as none is intended.
attributes.name: Harold

attributes.content: That much is true.
attributes.name: Degenbrecher

attributes.content: You say that, but you still refuse to give this poor old man your autograph, even as he's holding this card out.
attributes.name: Harold

attributes.content: I've treasured this trading card for a long time, you know. It was a limited release from the first time you won the Major. You never released another card...
attributes.name: Harold

attributes.content: It's a darn shame that I can't seem to win your favor no matter what.
attributes.name: Harold

attributes.content: That aside, when it comes to naming, there is something I've been curious about, and would appreciate if you could shed some light on the matter. Of course, you don't have to answer if you find it offensive.
attributes.name: Harold

attributes.content: 'Degenbrecher' –– Is that your real name?
attributes.name: Harold

attributes.content: You're certainly brave to ask, Craigavon.
attributes.name: Degenbrecher

attributes.content: I'm a man of few talents, but courage is something I do carry.
attributes.name: Harold

attributes.content: What if it is?
attributes.name: Degenbrecher

attributes.content: Just consider it scratching the itchy curiosity of your fans, Madam.
attributes.name: Harold

attributes.content: After all, every angle of your being has been under the spotlight since the first time you won the Major. The origins of the Black Knight, and where her path ultimately led her... Countless eyes have been following you.
attributes.name: Harold

attributes.content: Which brings me to my next question, Madam Degenbrecher, is your contract with Karlan Trade about to expire?
attributes.name: Harold

attributes.content: I do wonder if you'd spare me the honor of inviting you to be a guest of Victoria? No doubt, the Duke would be more than glad to welcome your arrival, and perhaps, we'd even be able to discuss new horizons of cooperation...
attributes.name: Harold

attributes.content: Uh huh. Is that all you wanted to ask?
attributes.name: Degenbrecher

attributes.content: If that's all you're here for, I've heard you out. Now, if you'd leave me in peace––
attributes.name: Degenbrecher

attributes.content: I've spent a decade in Kjerag.
attributes.name: Degenbrecher

attributes.content: I'm one of her people.
attributes.name: Degenbrecher

attributes.content: And I plan to live out my days here.
attributes.name: Degenbrecher

attributes.content: Good enough for you?
attributes.name: Degenbrecher

attributes.content: Ah... Yes, that's exactly what I wanted to hear.
attributes.name: Harold

attributes.content: I had my own speculation about the answer, but I must admit, it was quite moving to hear it in your own words... Why, you didn't even try to dress it up with more local flair!
attributes.name: Harold

attributes.content: True, I suppose you're dressed with a bit of color.
attributes.name: Degenbrecher

attributes.content: Where'd you get the fur collar?
attributes.name: Degenbrecher

attributes.content: Ah, this is from a souvenir shop I'm rather partial to. It's quite warm.
attributes.name: Harold

attributes.content: Alright, alright. It's getting late and the banquet should be drawing to an end soon, so I won't pester you any longer.
attributes.name: Harold

attributes.content: Though I wasn't fortunate enough to win your signature, I do want to say one thing...
attributes.name: Harold

attributes.content: I enjoyed our chat very much, Madam.
attributes.name: Harold

attributes.content: Please watch your step, Sir Enciodes.
attributes.name: Kjarr

attributes.content: Enciodes, I've brought the car.
attributes.name: Chester

attributes.content: Thank you, Uncle.
attributes.name: Enciodes

attributes.content: Are you returning to the mansion?
attributes.name: Chester

attributes.content: Back... to the office...
attributes.name: Gnosis

attributes.content: Enciodes?
attributes.name: Chester

attributes.content: What he said. There are still some chores I need to take care of.
attributes.name: Enciodes

attributes.content: Long time no see, Uncle Chester.
attributes.name: Enya

attributes.content: Saintess.
attributes.name: Chester

attributes.content: Just call me by name on these occasions.
attributes.name: Enya

attributes.content: Enya... I'm so glad to see you safe and sound.
attributes.name: Chester

attributes.content: The feeling is mutual. I'm relieved that you're in good health.
attributes.name: Enya

attributes.content: Now then, I shall take my leave, Holy Saintess, Sir Enciodes.
attributes.name: Harold

attributes.content: Very well.
attributes.name: Enya

attributes.content: My Lord.
attributes.name: Enya

attributes.content: Yes, Holy Saintess?
attributes.name: Harold

attributes.content: All else aside, I hope you have a wonderful time in Kjerag.
attributes.name: Enya

attributes.content: ...Thank you for your kind words.
attributes.name: Harold

attributes.content: Kjarr.
attributes.name: Enya

attributes.content: Yes, Saintess?
attributes.name: Kjarr

attributes.content: Please have the maids clean the mess.
attributes.name: Enya

attributes.content: Oh, there's no need for that.
attributes.name: Kjarr

attributes.content: The good soldiers not only helped clean everything up, but even took away the leftover food. They said they were going to bring it to the Infected soldiers who weren't able to attend the banquet.
attributes.name: Kjarr

attributes.content: This Viscount actually seems quite respectable. It feels as if he's playing the villain.
attributes.name: Enya

attributes.content: Though, I trust that's something Sir Enciodes here can relate to.
attributes.name: Enya

attributes.content: You flatter me, Saintess.
attributes.name: Enciodes

attributes.content: It's getting dark. Be careful on your way back.
attributes.name: Enya

attributes.content: You too.
attributes.name: Enciodes

attributes.content: Saintess.
attributes.name: Enciodes

attributes.content: Did you need something else?
attributes.name: Enya

attributes.content: In the name of Kjeragandr, Kjerag has arrived where she is today despite the gulf between us.
attributes.name: Enciodes

attributes.content: What would Kjeragandr think, were She to look down upon Her land today? Would She condemn us?
attributes.name: Enciodes

attributes.content: Are you getting cold feet?
attributes.name: Enya

attributes.content: Of course not. The miracle three years ago will forever be engraved in the hearts of all Kjerag.
attributes.name: Enciodes

attributes.content: Even I must admit that Kjeragandr indeed is the bedrock of this land.
attributes.name: Enciodes

attributes.content: We are all but children playing atop Her body.
attributes.name: Enciodes

attributes.content: If so, that question isn't for me to answer.
attributes.name: Enya

attributes.content: Perhaps, it's not for Her to answer either.
attributes.name: Enya

attributes.content: Alright, we're back.
attributes.name: Gnosis

attributes.content: I can go the rest of the way myself.
attributes.name: Gnosis

attributes.content: Oh, really?
attributes.name: Enciodes

attributes.content: ...It was just a minor miscalculation.
attributes.name: Gnosis

attributes.content: Hold on, I need a moment.
attributes.name: Gnosis

attributes.content: Certainly.
attributes.name: Enciodes

attributes.content: No, not at the main door. Head around the side.
attributes.name: Gnosis

attributes.content: What's the problem? Worried someone might see you?
attributes.name: Enciodes

attributes.content: Someone might be working overtime.
attributes.name: Gnosis

attributes.content: Who'd be working overtime at this hour?
attributes.name: Enciodes

attributes.content: Me.
attributes.name: Gnosis

attributes.content: And you too, probably.
attributes.name: Gnosis

attributes.content: Are you complaining that I haven't given you enough overtime pay?
attributes.name: Enciodes

attributes.content: Alright, Gnosis, sit down already. Nobody will see the drunken and indecent behavior of the CTO.
attributes.name: Enciodes

attributes.content: If you ask me, you're holding your own image to too high a standard.
attributes.name: Enciodes

attributes.content: You're a lot more talkative after a few drinks, Enciodes.
attributes.name: Gnosis

attributes.content: If anything, you owe Degenbrecher more overtime pay.
attributes.name: Gnosis

attributes.content: He actually owes me a few lives.
attributes.name: Degenbrecher

attributes.content: Too lazy to keep count.
attributes.name: Degenbrecher

attributes.content: The two leaders of Karlan Trade, squatting in the lobby of the company headquarters in the middle of the night to discuss unpaid wages?
attributes.name: Degenbrecher

attributes.content: Gnosis is fighting on your behalf.
attributes.name: Enciodes

attributes.content: Did the booze melt his brain?
attributes.name: Degenbrecher

attributes.content: It's not like I got sloshed for your sake––
attributes.name: Gnosis

attributes.content: Degenbrecher looks over at Enciodes, who only gives a shrug.
What an embarrassment.
attributes.name: Degenbrecher

attributes.content: Degenbrecher hands the canteen of water she brought over to Enciodes, and the latter naturally reaches out to accept it.
The last decade has seen countless such moments.
Do you still remember Walden's?
attributes.name: Enciodes

attributes.content: Who?
attributes.name: Degenbrecher

attributes.content: The first time you had to carry me and Gnosis back.
attributes.name: Enciodes

attributes.content: Oh, that banquet.
attributes.name: Enciodes

attributes.content: Yes.
attributes.name: Degenbrecher

attributes.content: Where Gnosis got piss drunk and you didn't, yet you were worse for wear because of it.
attributes.name: Degenbrecher

attributes.content: Look at him now. His liver is clearly a lot tougher these days.
attributes.name: Enciodes

attributes.content: At least he's not passing out all over the place.
attributes.name: Enciodes

attributes.content: You sure this one's still conscious?
attributes.name: Degenbrecher

attributes.content: Before you two start badmouthing me to my face, blurgh––
attributes.name: Gnosis

attributes.content: Can you bring me some hangover remedy?
attributes.name: Gnosis

attributes.content: The man slumped over on the steps does not lift his head, merely stretching his hand out towards his ill-spirited friend.
Degenbrecher raises her eyebrows, then takes a pack of pills out of her pocket and places them in Gnosis's hand.
She watches him open up the blister pack with practiced motions and swallow the contents along with a big gulp of water. After a while, she lets out a sigh of relief.
That's a bit better.
attributes.name: Gnosis

attributes.content: But this doesn't seem to be the same medicine I took before.
attributes.name: Gnosis

attributes.content: It's not a hangover cure.
attributes.name: Degenbrecher

attributes.content: It's a poison I made.
attributes.name: Degenbrecher

attributes.content: Enciodes put me up to it.
attributes.name: Degenbrecher

attributes.content: Yes, quite right.
attributes.name: Enciodes

attributes.content: Is that so? Then, why am I not dead yet? Doesn't seem like your poison's very effective.
attributes.name: Gnosis

attributes.content: How dull... Are you two not tired of this routine yet?
attributes.name: Gnosis

attributes.content: I thought it was pretty funny.
attributes.name: Degenbrecher

attributes.content: It was more fun back when you actually believed it and tried to make yourself vomit.
attributes.name: Degenbrecher

attributes.content: That was years ago.
attributes.name: Gnosis

attributes.content: But, that was a different pill, wasn't it?
attributes.name: Enciodes

attributes.content: It didn't look the same as the previous one.
attributes.name: Enciodes

attributes.content: Riley sent it.
attributes.name: Degenbrecher

attributes.content: He often goes drinking with the Victorians and says this one works better.
attributes.name: Degenbrecher

attributes.content: Enciodes, it seems that Degenbrecher has become the most popular of us three among the people of Kjerag.
attributes.name: Gnosis

attributes.content: Noticed the promotional pictures of the Black Knight hanging off the burdenbeast billboards by the station?
attributes.name: Gnosis

attributes.content: Hand-drawn, too.
attributes.name: Gnosis

attributes.content: Is that a problem?
attributes.name: Degenbrecher

attributes.content: Of course not.
attributes.name: Enciodes

attributes.content: I've become increasingly busy in recent years and have neglected many things.
attributes.name: Enciodes

attributes.content: Once the situation calms a bit, Gnosis and I really need to start going out more often.
attributes.name: Enciodes

attributes.content: That's for sure.
attributes.name: Degenbrecher

attributes.content: If you don't show your face in public every once in a while, people will start to worry about your private life.
attributes.name: Degenbrecher

attributes.content: One popular line of speculation is that you've thrown yourself into work as you've been heartbroken over certain things.
attributes.name: Degenbrecher

attributes.content: There are quite a few variations too. Want me to give you a rundown?
attributes.name: Degenbrecher

attributes.content: Hahahahahahagah–– *cough* *cough* *cough*–– * Bluuurgh––
attributes.name: Gnosis

attributes.content: I pray you don't choke to death laughing and vomiting at the same time, Gnosis.
attributes.name: Enciodes

attributes.content: If you could laugh like that all the time, our employees wouldn't be so afraid of you.
attributes.name: Enciodes

attributes.content: *cough* *cough*– Don't worry, before I croak, I'll make sure to puke all over your shoes.
attributes.name: Gnosis

attributes.content: So, how did your discussion today go? Reach any agreements?
attributes.name: Gnosis

attributes.content: When it comes to matters concerning Kjerag, there aren't actually that many differences between me and the Saintess.
attributes.name: Enciodes

attributes.content: What about between you and the girl named Enya?
attributes.name: Degenbrecher

attributes.content: ...The only problems worth talking about are those that can be resolved.
attributes.name: Enciodes

attributes.content: If I had to do things over again, I'd make the same decision every time. And she'd still never feel good about it.
attributes.name: Enciodes

attributes.content: We all know that deep down.
attributes.name: Enciodes

attributes.content: Say what you will, but you'll never tell that to her face.
attributes.name: Gnosis

attributes.content: You're not much different, Gnosis.
attributes.name: Degenbrecher

attributes.content: You're two peas in a pod.
attributes.name: Degenbrecher

attributes.content: Never saying what needs to be said to the people who need to hear it.
attributes.name: Degenbrecher

attributes.content: Also, you should be playing dead right about now.
attributes.name: Degenbrecher

attributes.content: The lights of the office still shine bright in the night. The heating in the main hall is shut off, and silence spreads freely through the room, along with the cold.
A moment later, the silence is broken by the sound of Gnosis retching.
Degenbrecher, I need another pill.
attributes.name: Gnosis

attributes.content: My head hurts.
attributes.name: Gnosis

attributes.content: ...And a couple for me too. I might be a bit tipsy.
attributes.name: Enciodes

attributes.content: Both men stretch out their hands towards Degenbrecher at the same time.
That unflappable attitude that someone there knows the truth makes Degenbrecher tingle with irritation for some reason.
There are still many questions that cannot be answered.
But at least here, right in this moment, there's no need to show off, no need for pretense.
Degenbrecher heeds her own will, and slaps each of the two hands in turn.
Gah...
attributes.name: Gnosis

attributes.content: Oh?
attributes.name: Enciodes

attributes.content: Stand up. Go home already, if you're drunk.
attributes.name: Degenbrecher

attributes.content: Don't squat here.
attributes.name: Degenbrecher

attributes.content: There's a lot of work to be done tomorrow.
attributes.name: Degenbrecher

attributes.content: Now, go.
attributes.name: Degenbrecher
